title: Marketing Budget Allocation & Carl Revival
body:
Another sad morning for the Revenge Cats. Carl passed away for the second time and only has 7 lives left.

It's clear that the EmergencyLove contract, while useful, was no substitute for more caretakers around the clock interacting with Carl and the game.

Thankfully, your Head Cat was already sniffing out ways to combat this particular issue ahead of time.

I propose the following:

1. Use the owner's ability to revive Carl.

2. Redeploy the EmergencyLove contract, changing the process from burning tokens, to using them as incentives in a new system (TBD).

3. Use half of the accumulated marketing budget ($3000 or so) to purchase advertisements in an attempt to bring in more caretakers.

4. Use the other half of the marketing budget ($3000 or so) to further accelerate Carl's growth. We will do this by depositing it into the BNB rewards, which will buy CAKE once claimed. This will continue to aggressively ramp up the appeal of the game.

I will announce the full mechanisms shortly, but those who interact with the Revenge Cat systems will have a chance to earn all the accumulated LOVE tokens with a fairly small investment. This should provide great incentive and profitability for players to keep Carl alive.
author: 0x408ECB06EF97705Afb02646ae1E5537F370a6bfB
